entry.title: The Hanging Shower Caddy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 34.00

Description

Getting clean never felt so ... clean. This shower caddy was designed to drain and dry so you can get on with your day after that intense (or not so) workout. The mesh material is quick drying and will ensure no pools of water collect. Just enough room for all your shower needs and a few extra necessities.
Specifications

Dims: 9.5"H x 4.5"W x 5"D
Materials: PVC
Care: Clean with warm water and soap, air dry

 
Details
DETAILS:
The you gym friendly shower caddy
Mesh material for easy draining and drying
Easy to hang over a shower head, on a hook or clipped over a towel bar
Front flap folds down to show interior
Mesh panel keeps products upright for easy storage and display
Elastic loops for a tooth brush and/or razor
Exterior side zip pocket

How you can move with this product
Cosmetics & toiletries
Shower caddy for gym and beyond
Travel

entry.title: The Hanging Cosmetic Case in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 58.00

Description

This well-groomed cosmetic case is a spill-proof protector for your most valuable assets, your skin care and beauty products! Made for the traveler who prefers to take their entire routine with them, no one should have to compromise their skincare regimen, keeping every last essential organized and hanging at your fingertips! Made of durable nylon with a handle to easily tote it around. A useful TSA compliant clear to-go pouch makes carry-on life a breeze. Consider your travel beauty routine handled!
Specifications

Dims: 9.75 x 7.25 x 6.5
Materials:Body - Nylon Twill, Trim - Vegan Buffalo Leather, Lining - Poly w/ Water resistant protective finish, Hardware - Brushed Gold and Matte Black, Pouch - Clear TPU, Zippers Nylon Coil
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1.14lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- Easy to carry top handle with BÉIS logo
- Double U-zip open/closure
- Easy to wipe clean nylon fabric

INTERIOR
- Easy to wipe clean, durable, lining with stain resistant finish
- Removable "To Go" clear zip pouch
- Clear zip pocket
- 2 small mesh elasticized pockets
- 1 large mesh elasticized pocket
- Hidden hanger

PERFECT FOR
-Cosmetics
-Skin Care
-Toiletries
-Makeup Brushes
-All the Hair Ties
-Make-Up Artist

entry.title: The Hot Tools Cover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Luggage Accessories
Price: 34.00

Description

No tool is too big or too small for this cover! AND we’ve packed in even more with an extra slip pocket, lined with burn-proof lining, so you can bring your curling iron and your flat iron! Tuck any hot tool, still piping hot, into the The Hot Tools Cover and worry no more. Last minute touch-ups, yes! Burned blouses, no!
Specifications

Dims: 15"H x 4.75"W x 1.5"D
Materials:
Exterior - Poly Canvas
LIning - Heat Resistant liner
Trim - PU edge binding
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.35lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- large enough for any hot tool
- extra slip pocket, lined with burn-proof lining
PERFECT FOR
Travel
At home Storage

entry.title: The Cosmetic Pouch Set in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: the cosmetic pouch set
Price: 24.00

Description

You're way too organized, said no one ever! This simple set of pouches can organize just about anything from your day to day needs to your travel essentials, keeping everything zipped up and tidy in two compact pieces!
Specifications
Dims:
Large pouch - 11"W x 6"H x 2"D
Small Pouch - 675"W x 4.75"H x 2"D
Materials:Body - PU, Trim - nylon coil zippers, Lining - Poly
Care: spot clean
Weight: 0.52lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- 2 piece cosmetic pouch set
- one large, one small
LARGE
- interior zipper pocket
- center divider creates two compartments
SMALL
- 1 interior slip pocket
PERFECT FOR
-Cosmetics
-Skin Care (face cream, sprays)
-Toiletries
-Eye Mask
-Face Mask
-Lip Gloss
-Hot Mess Wipes
-Hand Sanitizer
-toothpaste & toothbrush

entry.title: The On The Go Essential Case in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 48.00

Description

Stop the pre-flight dig with our two-faced travel companion. Designed to keep your beauty essentials organized from take-off to touch-down with an easy-to-carry handle and a mini-mirror. Tackle your travel beauty routine effortlessly.
Specifications
Dims: 7.5"W X 3.5"H x 5.25"D
Materials:
Body: PU, PVC
Lining: Poly
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.56lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- faux leather fabrication
- gold foil stamped 'let's go" & "we're here" label for compartments
- double sided cosmetic case to separate your take-off and touch-down needs (and beyond)
- single U-zip wide opening/closure for easy access to beauty essentials
- clear windows to help you see what's inside
INTERIOR
- slip pocket with mini removable mirror
PERFECT FOR:
-Cosmetics
-Skin Care (face cream, sprays)
-Toiletries
-Eye Mask
-Face Mask
-Lip Gloss
-Hot Mess Wipes
-Hand Sanitizer
-toothpaste & toothbrush

entry.title: The Mesh Pouch Trio in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: the mesh pouch trio
Price: 14.00

Description

Too big, too small and jusssttt right! No one, not even you, will be losing all those little bits and bobbles when they are organized in this handy set of three. Made of mesh, so they are just the right amount of see-through and a d-ring that makes them easily clip-able into any BÉIS bag with key leash (hint ALL of them), we are setting you up for organizational success here! The interior of your bag will rejoice!
Shay's Inspo
“ Mostly, I made these to organize my well curated collection of mini hot sauces! ” —Shay
Details

3 POUCHES
Small, medium, large
C-RING
For easy clipping into any BÉIS bag
NYLON MESH
see-through, just a little bit
BRANDED 
For your pleasure

entry.title: The Dopp Kit in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Cosmetic & Toiletry Bags
Price: 48.00

Description

A spill-proof bag for all the bottles, tubes, jars and sprays your getting-ready routine requires. What we love most about this kit—besides its pair of organizational compartments—is the clever loop to hang from towel hooks so you can keep all your lotions and potions from falling off that tiny hotel vanity situation.

 
Specifications

Dims: 6.5"H x 9"W x 6"D
Materials:
Body: Cotton/Jute Canvas (beige) or Poly Canvas (black), PU
Trim - nylon zippers
Lining - water resistant poly lining
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 0.88lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- wire frame double zip opening/closure - opens wide to see inside
- double zip around bottom compartment
INTERIOR
- water resistant lining in bottom compartment
- special pocket just for keeping your toothbrush/tooth care clean
- easy to wipe clean, durable lining
PERFECT FOR
-Lotions + Potions
-Beauty Routines
-Bits + Baubles

entry.title: The Cosmetic Case in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Cosmetic & Toiletry Bags
Price: 58.00

Description

We made this spill-proof cosmetic case so every makeup-lover can stay super organized wherever they bring their beauty rituals. Far away from home? No worries—comes with a mirror for en route touch-ups! And you won’t have to leave any of your favorite products behind because this makeup case has PLENTY of storage. Plus a removable brush holder that pops out (because no one wants to flip back and forth between cheeks and lips). Translation: nail your eye makeup wherever you roam.
Specifications
Dims: 9.5"W x 4"H x 7"D
Materials:
Body - PU
Trim - nylon zippers, PVC
Lining - Poly with water resistant finish
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 1.38lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- exterior features easy to wipe clean faux leather
- easy to carry handle with BÉIS logo
- double U-zip open/closure
INTERIOR
- easy to wipe clean, durable, lining
- removable brush holder with hidden magnets (easy to grab on and stick back on) holds several brushes, easy to clean PVC material with flap to protect delicate brushes, elastic closure, long zip pocket on back
- slip pocket with removable mirror for touch-ups on the go
- one long slip pocket & two small slip pockets
PERFECT FOR
-Organizing cosmetics
-Makeup brushes
-All the hair ties
